title: If I have stocks or other assets but don't have cash Cn I delay paying Zakat on them assim al hakeem
transcript: Shake If a person possesses a certain amount of money in form of stocks or via lending someone money and calculates his zaka at the end of his lunar year but doesn't hold that much of cash in order to pay off zaka can he delay his zaka until he holds the amount to be paid next year no this is not permissible he has to sell some of his stocks or borrow money to pay off this this zakat the zakat is time bound after one lunar year you have to give the zakat and you cannot delay it except for maybe few days a week or so but to delay it this long no this is not permissible
